column15: - Further collaboration and development of concepts for vocabularies. - Getty vocabularies crosswalks where they apply  - In doing all this work, we hope that FAIR Epigraphy will use as many different applications of the EpiDoc schema as possible, so as to accommodate the ways different projects mark up documents and metadata.
